titles.title: New vigour involving statisticians to overcome ensemble fatigue

custom_metadata.assertion: The authors declare no competing financial interests.

citation.author: R Knutti
citation.unstructured_citation: Knutti, R. & Sedláček, J. Robustness and uncertainties in the new CMIP5 climate model projections. Nat. Clim. Change 3, 369–373 (2013). Argues that the new generation of more complex models running scenarios for the IPCC's AR5 is widely, and perhaps naively, expected to provide more detailed and more certain projections.
